name: Afterlife (itch) (Oliver Jones, RichMB, AdewuyiA)
description:
A narrative driven detective game set in heaven where you decide who is allowed to enter heaven and who must be sent to hell. As each person enters the room requesting access to heaven, it is in your interest to investigate that person about their past to help you make the correct decision

There is an WebGL playable and downloadable version of the game! We suggest the Downloadable version of the game because of graphically fidelity however they are both the same!

Designed to be played with Keyboard and Mouse.
Controls
Left click - Select, Skip Forward Text
Right Click - Zoom
Escape - Pause
W,A,S,D - Directional Movement
